Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ask for Uganda Facts, and enhance your knowledge of the beautiful country

Uganda Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Uganda Facts" or "Alexa, open Uganda Facts" to get a fact".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
